# TASK::TASK_CHAT_TO_PED

## Summary
Tells the ped to chat to a ped (see wiki)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **PED_INDEX** pedToChatToIndex
* **CHAT_FLAGS** chatFlags
* **FLOAT** optionalGoToPositionX
* **FLOAT** optionalGoToPositionY
* **FLOAT** optionalGoToPositionZ
* **FLOAT** optionalHeading
* **FLOAT** idleTime: Specifies an extra wait period after an anim has finished, calls to IS_CHATTING_PED_PLAYING_ANIM will return false during this period

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p2 tend to be 16, 17 or 1
p3 to p7 tend to be 0.0
